Flow.description: Process for new opportunities and updates to existing opportunities

value.stringValue:
and( $User.Override_Workflow__c = false,
or( left([Opportunity].RecordTypeId , 15) = left($Label.RT_Opp_ChannelEnrollment, 15), left([Opportunity].RecordTypeId , 15) = left($Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment, 15), left([Opportunity].RecordTypeId , 15) = left($Label.RT_Opp_Additional_Semester, 15) ),
or( isnew(), ischanged([Opportunity].Name), ischanged([Opportunity].RecordTypeId) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression:
and( {!$User.Override_Workflow__c} = false,
or( left({!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} , 15) = left({!$Label.RT_Opp_ChannelEnrollment}, 15), left({!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} , 15) = left({!$Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment}, 15), left({!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} , 15) = left({!$Label.RT_Opp_Additional_Semester}, 15) ),
or( isnew(), ischanged({!myVariable_current.Name}), ischanged({!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId}) ) )

value.stringValue:
AND(
$User.Override_Workflow__c = False,
or( LEFT($Label.RT_Opp_ChannelEnrollment , 15) = LEFT([Opportunity].RecordTypeId , 15) , LEFT($Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment , 15) = LEFT([Opportunity].RecordTypeId , 15) , LEFT($Label.RT_Opp_Additional_Semester , 15) = LEFT([Opportunity].RecordTypeId , 15) ),
or( isnew(), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_11
formulas.expression:
AND(
{!$User.Override_Workflow__c} = False,
or( LEFT({!$Label.RT_Opp_ChannelEnrollment} , 15) = LEFT({!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} , 15) , LEFT({!$Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment} , 15) = LEFT({!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} , 15) , LEFT({!$Label.RT_Opp_Additional_Semester} , 15) = LEFT({!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} , 15) ),
or( isnew(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName} ) ) )

value.stringValue:
and( $User.Override_Workflow__c = false,
or( left( [Opportunity].RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment , 15), left( [Opportunity].RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_ChannelEnrollment , 15), left( [Opportunity].RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_Additional_Semester , 15) ),
ischanged( [Opportunity].Original_Program__c ),
isblank( [Opportunity].Current_Program__c ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_22
formulas.expression:
and( {!$User.Override_Workflow__c} = false,
or( left( {!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} , 15) = left( {!$Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment} , 15), left( {!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} , 15) = left( {!$Label.RT_Opp_ChannelEnrollment} , 15), left( {!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} , 15) = left( {!$Label.RT_Opp_Additional_Semester} , 15) ),
ischanged( {!myVariable_current.Original_Program__c} ),
isblank( {!myVariable_current.Current_Program__c} ) )

value.stringValue:
and( $User.Override_Workflow__c = false,
left( [Opportunity].RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment , 15),
ispickval([Opportunity].Family_Admissions_Call_Status__c, "Completed"),
[Opportunity].Check_500_Word_Writing_Sample__c = true,
[Opportunity].Check_High_School_Transcript__c = true,
ispickval([Opportunity].StageName, "Requirements Gathering"),
or( ischanged([Opportunity].Family_Admissions_Call_Status__c), ischanged([Opportunity].Check_500_Word_Writing_Sample__c), ischanged([Opportunity].Check_High_School_Transcript__c) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_24
formulas.expression:
and( {!$User.Override_Workflow__c} = false,
left( {!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} , 15) = left( {!$Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment} , 15),
ispickval({!myVariable_current.Family_Admissions_Call_Status__c}, "Completed"),
{!myVariable_current.Check_500_Word_Writing_Sample__c} = true,
{!myVariable_current.Check_High_School_Transcript__c} = true,
ispickval({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Requirements Gathering"),
or( ischanged({!myVariable_current.Family_Admissions_Call_Status__c}), ischanged({!myVariable_current.Check_500_Word_Writing_Sample__c}), ischanged({!myVariable_current.Check_High_School_Transcript__c}) ) )

value.stringValue: AND( $User.Override_Workflow__c = FALSE, [Opportunity].Account.Counseling_Trigger__c = False, OR( AND( LEFT([Opportunity].RecordTypeId, 15 ) = LEFT($Label.RT_Opp_Additional_Semester , 15), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Closed Won")), AND( LEFT([Opportunity].RecordTypeId, 15 ) = LEFT($Label.RT_Opp_ChannelEnrollment , 15), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Closed Won")), AND( LEFT([Opportunity].RecordTypeId , 15 ) = LEFT( $Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment, 15), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Post_Verto_Plans__c , "Needs Decision to Deposit"), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Post_Verto_Plans__c )), AND( LEFT([Opportunity].RecordTypeId , 15 ) = LEFT( $Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment, 15), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Post_Verto_Plans__c , "Already Committed To Plans"), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Post_Verto_Plans__c )), AND( LEFT([Opportunity].RecordTypeId , 15 ) = LEFT( $Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment, 15), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Post_Verto_Plans__c , "Wants College Counseling"), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Closed Won"))))

formulas.name: formula_myRule_26
formulas.expression: AND( {!$User.Override_Workflow__c} = FALSE, {!myVariable_current.Account.Counseling_Trigger__c} = False, OR( AND( LEFT({!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId}, 15 ) = LEFT({!$Label.RT_Opp_Additional_Semester} , 15), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName}), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Closed Won")), AND( LEFT({!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId}, 15 ) = LEFT({!$Label.RT_Opp_ChannelEnrollment} , 15), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName}), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Closed Won")), AND( LEFT({!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} , 15 ) = LEFT( {!$Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment}, 15), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Post_Verto_Plans__c} , "Needs Decision to Deposit"), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Post_Verto_Plans__c} )), AND( LEFT({!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} , 15 ) = LEFT( {!$Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment}, 15), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Post_Verto_Plans__c} , "Already Committed To Plans"), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Post_Verto_Plans__c} )), AND( LEFT({!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} , 15 ) = LEFT( {!$Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment}, 15), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Post_Verto_Plans__c} , "Wants College Counseling"), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName}), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Closed Won"))))

value.stringValue:
and( $User.Override_Workflow__c = false,
or( isnew(), ischanged( [Opportunity].OwnerId ) ),
left( [Opportunity].OwnerId, 15 ) <> left($Label.User_GeneralSalesforceAdmin , 15 ),
[Opportunity].IsWon = false )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_9
formulas.expression:
and( {!$User.Override_Workflow__c} = false,
or( isnew(), ischanged( {!myVariable_current.OwnerId} ) ),
left( {!myVariable_current.OwnerId}, 15 ) <> left({!$Label.User_GeneralSalesforceAdmin} , 15 ),
{!myVariable_current.IsWon} = false )

Flow.label: *New or Updates to Existing Opps

value.stringValue: Most Recent Send EA Link Date/Time
